3.3.name: wordpress/gaphub-wp-directory
3.3.description:
gapHub-wp-directoryis a plugin to make your WordPress blog a membership driven site.

Features:

  • Create custom membership fields.
  • Set your Field validation as you want.
  • Action and filter hooks for extensibility.

The plugin installs with additional custom fields to the membership process. Using the gapHub-wp-directoryadmin panel, you can create additional fields and delete existing ones. This offers you a premium content site with a professional and branded look and feel. It also provides an opportunity for the user to register without leaving the page. There are also some special pages that can be created with simple shortcodes:

  • A Members Area where members can fill their information and upload their image.
  • A Search Area where members can Search professionals.
